name: Cargills Ma Wee (Hangimuttan Rice)
description: This is a white rice variety with a unique texture that is low in carbohydrates, rich in protein and fiber. It has a nutrient make up of 84.5% carbohydrates, 9.4% protein, 3.6% fat and 1.1% fiber. It is one of the heirloom varieties of rice that has been respected throughout history for its nutritional and medicinal properties of minimizing the effects of diabetes and improving bladder function.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
